decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 19 (Drainage) of permission 22/01273/KPSID. The applicant has not demonstrated that the sustainable drainage scheme for the site has been completed in accordance with the submitted details and therefore fails to to manage the increased risk of flooding, therefore, not improving and protecting the water quality or improving habitat and amenities.
description: Details required by Condition 19 (Drainage) of permission 22/01273/KPSID (Demolition of existing buildings and associated structures and the erection of two storey building to provide new mental health floorspace together with ancillary and associated development including new and enhanced pedestrian routes /spaces and access, vehicular access, roads and car parking, servicing facilities, landscaping, infrastructure and other associated works)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL SB1  South of the Borough
KEYACH Tolworth Key Area of Change
